attributes.action: take steps to implement this petition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: where i live i am unable to park near my home due to the increasing number of white vans and works vehicles that are brought home in the evening and at weekends.this is compounded by the fact that many of these drivers also have their own vehicles parked alongside to.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
